name: Silent Hill: Promise The Final Chapter
name_original: Silent Hill: Promise The Final Chapter
description:
Silent Hill: Promise the webcomic has been running since 2010. Now, enjoy the final chapter of the story in visual novel form.

  • 7 unique endings
  • Original music
  • Over 10,000 words of text
  • PC, Mac and Linux versions

Not caught up on the rest of the story? Play the game AFTER you read it here: http://promise.rookerystudios.com/
